msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuits Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol 2

org.placeName: Ninth Judicial Circuit. Western District of Washington, Northern Division.

div1.p: County of King, State of Washington. SS.

Joseph Walton, being duly sworn, on oath deposes and says: That he is the petitioner named and described in the foregoing petition and whose name is subscribed thereto; that he has read said petition and whose name is subscribed thereto; that he believes the same to be true.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 10th day of January, 1906.
Notary Public, in and for the State of Washington, residing at Seattle.
